title: Client fails to connect to the server because the server begins to listen only later

content.raw:
The boost error passed into ```Connection::OnConnect``` is ```system:61``` which is ```Connection refused```.

Kernel log shows that server begins to listen after this failure occurs.

No error is printed anywhere. The code loses boosts's error```system:61```.
UI comes up dysfunctional.

How is client supposed to synchronize with the server? You should first begin to listen, and then launch the client.

FreeBSD 11.2
rev. 490bc3398435
